241b7('bum): mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzug
241b8('bum): lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
242a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
242a2('bum): chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmig
242a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
242a4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te
242a5('bum): reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa
242a6('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
242a7('bum): ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lca'i 'das te rag pa las bang pa'achar pa ma dmigs pa'i
242b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i
242b2('bum): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nomakhan
242b3('bum): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i
242b4('bum): tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi
242b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa
242b6('bum): tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan
243a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
243a2('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi
243a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs
243a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong
243a5('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan
243a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pastong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo
243a7('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
243b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs
243b2('bum): rnams dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dam+b+hi
243b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
243b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
243b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge
243b6('bum): 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
243b7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen
244a1('bum): po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
244a2('bum): dang / lam gyis rnam par shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro//
244a3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
244a4('bum): theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung bstan/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa
244a5('bum): bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
244a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / bi
244a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang
244b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
244b2('bum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
244b3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
244b4('bum): yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
244b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin/
244b6('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / sna
244b7('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni/ ci'i phyir bstan/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis
245a1('bum): @#rnam par rtse ba dag kyang snyan cing / des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ des na mngon
245a2('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na/ des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sang+yas kyi zhing du dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
245a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba dang / bud dud bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / phun sum chog
245a4('bum): bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ba ste/
245a5('bum): ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
245a6('bum): chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad ba med pa'i spobs pa dang mnyan par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i
245a7('bum): spobs dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon tu 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan
245b1('bum): ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
245b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
245b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chen po stong pa
245b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
245b5('bum): to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// 'dus/ byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsu
245b6('bum): rgya cher bstan to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
245b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang bzhin stong
246a1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum
246a2('bum): rgya cher bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul
246a3('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i
246a4('bum): tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
246a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bston to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu skyed pa'i bar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta
246a6('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
246a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
246b1('bum): dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
246b2('bum): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi chen nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dang
246b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
246b4('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gta/
246b5('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa
246b6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin ga skye
246b7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
247a1('bum): dag bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan/ des na byang chub
247a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongasu nyam pa med
247a3('bum): pa'i chos can du spong 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang /
247a4('bum): bkur bstir bya ba dang / phung dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
247a5('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyu ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam
247a6('bum): par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i
247a7('bum): spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i
247b1('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang / yang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang
247b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i/
247b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rna
247b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dang stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
247b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
247b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
247b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag/
248a1('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
248a2('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon
248a3('bum): par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi snyoms cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byam
248a4('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul/
248a5('bum): gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya'o// des
248a6('bum): na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom
248a7('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
248b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyuraro// 'khrug pa
248b2('bum): med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de dag mi dmigs pa'i
248b3('bum): tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i
248b4('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spongs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyi nang stong pa nyid
248b5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta
248b6('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
248b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / bya stang pa nying dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
249a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
249a2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
249a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang nga
249a4('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang
249a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
249a6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting
249a7('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
249a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
249b1('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
249b2('bum): par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//
249b3('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
249b4('bum): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
249b5('bum): rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi
249b6('bum): bar du nam yang rgyun 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem
249b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i
250a1('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
250a2('bum): 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzungs bstan to//
250a3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
250a4('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
250a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
250a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nga
250a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
250b1('bum): be nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang //
250b2('bum): dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsapa gtan bzhi dang
250b3('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa
250b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gsheg
250b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
250b6('bum): dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse bar dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'
250b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can
251a1('bum): @#du'ang 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur
251a2('bum): bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
251a3('bum): gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du ma/ yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis
251a4('bum): kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med
251a5('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la
251a6('bum): mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan
251a7('bum): te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems pa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
251b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
251b2('bum): byi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
251b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
251b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
251b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
251b6('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
251b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
251b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba
252a1('bum): @#smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi
252a2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang
252a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang stan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
252a4('bum): po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te bskye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su mnyam pa med pa'i chos can du ya
252a5('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bskur
252a6('bum): bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
252a7('bum): chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyis bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa
252b1('bum): pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa

252b3('bum): dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// / bam po bcu gsum pa//

252b5('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtam
252b6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
252b7('bum): dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
253a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po sde
253a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
253a3('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
253a4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs bde pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
253a5('bum): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
253a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
253a7('bum): ba bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub
253b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te bskyed par 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos
253b2('bum): can du 'ong bar 'gyu po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur

254a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

254a6('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba

254b4('bum): bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam

255a4('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed
255a5('bum): pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
255a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
255a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las stong pa nyid dang /

255b4('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa

255b6('bum): ba lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
255b7('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
256a1('bum): @#par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye
256a2('bum): bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing
256a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge
256a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam
256a5('bum): yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs

256b1('bum): ldan par yang 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems
256b2('bum): bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
256b3('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
256b4('bum): byi stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mthu
256b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang //
256b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
256b7('bum): dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
257a1('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
257a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
257a3('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
257a4('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
257a5('bum): dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sem
257a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su mnyam pa med pa'i chos
257a7('bum): can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
257b1('bum): bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de/
257b2('bum): yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang / rtag tu
257b3('bum): mnyam par gzhag par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chang pa med pa'i spobs pa
257b4('bum): dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
257b5('bum): shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang
257b6('bum): po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu/
257b7('bum): phyin pa dang / rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
258a1('bum): @#pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don ngas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
258a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
258a3('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yA
258a4('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa
258a5('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
258a6('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
258a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/
258b1('bum): bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan to// des na byang chub sems dang
258b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mnyam pa med pa'i chos can du 'ang
258b3('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu
258b4('bum): dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las gang thos pa de yang rnam
258b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam
258b6('bum): par gzhag par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i
258b7('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon
259a1('bum): @par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod/
259a2('bum): su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
259a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
259a4('bum): phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
259a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
259a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong
259a7('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang
259b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
259b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mtshan ma med
259b3('bum): pa dang smon ma med pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
259b4('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
259b5('bum): kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye
259b6('bum): bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam par med pa'i chos can du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
259b7('bum): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum
260a1('bum): @tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang
260a2('bum): rgyun 'chad parla 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260a3('bum): po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spob
260a4('bum): pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par
260a5('bum): 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar
260a6('bum): gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
260a7('bum): bsapa gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ba dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
260b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
260b2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang //
260b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
260b4('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam ya na lha
260b5('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
260b6('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
260b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
261a1('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
261a2('bum): kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing /
261a3('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
261a4('bum): 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag le rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de
261a5('bum): lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi
261a6('bum): bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
261a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgan 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs dang / rigs
261b1('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
261b2('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu
261b3('bum): pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems pa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
261b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
261b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
261b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang mtshan
261b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
262a1('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
262a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi

262a5('bum): pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
262a6('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
262a7('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /
262b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i de dge ba'i rtsa ba
262b2('bum): de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad
262b3('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa
262b4('bum): tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /

262b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa skyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta
262b7('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
263a1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
263a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med/
263a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
263a4('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
263a5('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden
263a6('bum): ba bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
263a7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung
263b1('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
263b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan
263b3('bum): te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la
263b4('bum): yongs su nyim pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
263b5('bum): la rib 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bdud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba 'dod par lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyu ro// sangs
263b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang
263b7('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
264a1('bum): thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i
264a2('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyu ro// mi dmigs
264a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
264a4('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
264a5('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
264a6('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang
264a7('bum): thog ma dang ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
264b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
264b2('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
264b3('bum): brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
264b4('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting
264b5('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
264b6('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par she/
264b7('bum): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye
265a1('bum): 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
265a2('bum): 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de
265a3('bum): lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
265a4('bum): bar ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyuraro//
265a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par
265a6('bum): gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
265a7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyu ro/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed nas sems bcu
265b1('bum): pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
265b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
265b3('bum): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
265b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
265b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
265b6('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bas
265b7('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par/
266a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
266a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
266a3('bum): kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
266a4('bum): chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon pa shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur/
266a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
266a6('bum): bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos de yang
266a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang rgyun 'chang bar mi 'gyuraro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis/
266b1('bum): rtag tu bad+ma gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad
266b2('bum): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig
266b3('bum): rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
266b4('bum): chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
266b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
266b6('bum): tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
266b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid

267a2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang
267a3('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /

267a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs bI
267a6('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
267a7('bum): kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267b1('bum): chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyuraro// sangs
267b2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
267b3('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bu sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
267b4('bum): nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang / rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur /
